Announcing the Server App-V Recipes, Tips &#038; Tricks feed

Apr 26, 2011 Aaron Parker

I’ve previously written about the Desktop App-V Recipes, Tips and Tricks list that fellow App-V MVP, Nicke Källén and I have been compiling over the past year. This list has recently reached well over 220 links and highlights the fantastic efforts of many different contributors.

Now that Server App-V is publicly available in preview and server application recipes are being published, it’s time to start compiling the Server App-V Recipes, Tips and Tricks list. Like the Desktop App-V list, this is an RSS feed that you can use to stay up to date with Server App-V links from around the Internets.

The list currently sits at 1 and I don’t think we’ll be at 220 this time next year, but I’m keen to see how this one progresses.
